channel.title: CVE Feed for Lester 'GaMerZ' Chan -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-25605|2024-08-03T04:42:49.984Z -- lester%20%27gamerz%27%20chan -- wp-downloadmanager%20%28wordpress%29
item.description: Multiple Authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities discovered in WP-DownloadManager WordPress plugin (versions <= 1.68.6). Vvulnerable parameters &download_path, &download_path_url, &download_page_url.

item.title: CVE-2022-36422|2024-08-03T10:07:34.067Z -- lester%20%27gamerz%27%20chan -- wp-postratings%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Rating increase/decrease via race condition in Lester 'GaMerZ' Chan WP-PostRatings plugin <= 1.89 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-40130|2024-08-03T12:14:39.758Z -- lester%20%27gamerz%27%20chan -- wp-polls%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (subscriber+) Race Condition vulnerability in WP-Polls plugin <= 2.76.0 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-25606|2024-08-03T04:42:50.290Z -- lester%20%27gamerz%27%20chan -- wp-downloadmanager%20%28wordpress%29
item.description: Multiple Authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities discovered in WP-DownloadManager WordPress plugin (versions <= 1.68.6). Vulnerable parameters &download_path, &download_path_url, &download_page_url, &download_categories.
